author: tnridgerunner
title: Neat Figure
review: Interesting and unique design. All of the components lend themselves well to other uses. Love the water bottle.

author: Odeinoichus
title: Fitness and Dancing combined together at last.
review:
Set #71018 Dance Instructor: Another character from Series 17 that looks straight out of the 80's. She also looks like she'd be great friends with the Series 5 Fitness Instructor.

Dance Instructor is wearing a one-piece leotard in hot pink with some zany highlights, her legs are dual-molded with some zebra print leggings on the top and plain teal boots. Her arms feature sweat bands printed on the wrists and she also has a headband under her outrageous hair piece, two pieces combine to make a nice water bottle accessory too.

As a child of the 80's and a huge fan of anything nostalgic concerning it I wholeheartedly recommend this figure if you missed her out or share my views on such things. Also her parts look stunning and really great. Highly recommended.
